At that time, the night spirit Perfect Virtues of the Ocean of Tranquil Sound, wishing to restate the meaning of this liberation, spoke a verse for the youth Sudhana:
Good son, listen to me as I explain this pure and wondrous liberation gate.
Having heard it, give rise to joy and delight, and diligently cultivate it to the end, causing it to be realized and entered.
In the past, I cultivated for many eons, giving rise to a vast and profound mind of faith.
Always contemplating the nature of dharmas, causing it to manifest, I quickly realized the omniscience that is like space.
In the buddhas of the three times, I gave rise to a mind of faith and joy,
The most supreme and pure retinue, all vowing to serve and always be close to them.
I saw the past teachers of gods and humans, for the sake of benefiting beings, I made offerings to them all,
Hearing this vast and pure Dharma gate, my mind was filled with reverence and joy.
Always towards parents and teachers, with respect and reverence, causing them to rejoice,
In this way, I never had a lazy or lax mind, able to deeply enter this liberation.
